thread.title: EXCLUSIVE: Hearts to name Tom Strand as new head coach, Yaw Preko and Nassam Yakubu also to join new technical team
thread.title_full: EXCLUSIVE: Hearts to name Tom Strand as new head coach, Yaw Preko and Nassam Yakubu also to join new technical team

title: EXCLUSIVE: Hearts to name Tom Strand as new head coach, Yaw Preko and Nassam Yakubu also to join new technical team
text:
FIFA 2010   14:25 CET EXCLUSIVE: Hearts to name Tom Strand as new head coach, Yaw Preko and Nassam Yakubu also to join new technical team - www.ghanasoccernet.com Tom Strand to be named new Hearts coach by Tuesday 
Hearts of Oak will be announcing their newly constituted technical team to be headed by Tom Strand alongside the appointment of Yaw Preko and Nassam Yakubu as assistant coach and goalkeeper's trainer respectively by Tuesday, GHANAsoccernet.com is reliably informed. 
The Phobians have moved quickly to agree with personal terms with the Swedish trainer after getting the go-ahead from Medeama. 
For more Ghana football news visit www.ghanasoccernet.com
